thread.title_full: Wearable technology & business travel: what's your view? | Buying Business Travel

title: Wearable technology & business travel: what's your view? | Buying Business Travel
text:
0 comments Paul Revel Fri, 16 Oct 2015 16:53 Follow @TravelbizPaul Calling all travel professionals: what role could or should wearable technology play in business travel?
Please take a couple of minutes to complete our very quick survey , for a feature in the upcoming issue of Buying Business travel : https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/BBTwearables
Thank you for taking the time, and keep an eye out for the results in the November/December edition of BBT .
